ai.desc: #wSmash every turn.
#wSmash every turn.
#wSmash every turn.
#wSmash every turn.
#wProtects random allies until none remain, and then uses #wShield #wBash.
Every 3 turns starting from turn 3, uses #wSmash. Otherwise, has an equal chance of either using #wBash followed by #wFortify or #wFortify followed by #wBash.

Always cycles in the order of #wCharge #wUp -> #wFierce #wBash -> #wVent #wSteam -> #wWhirlwind. The fight always begins with #wCharge #wUp. After using #wTwin #wSlam in defensive mode, #wWhirlwind is used next. NL NL Upon entering defensive mode, it uses #wClose #wUp (not shown), which gives #uSharp #uHide #u4. Then, it proceeds to #wRoll #wAttack -> #wTwin #wSlam and return to offensive mode with #wWhirlwind.

When not splitting, approximately a 40-30-30 probability split between #wCorrosive #wSpit, #wTackle, and #wLick. #wLick cannot be used twice in a row, and the other moves cannot be used three times in a row.
Starts with #wCircle #wOf #wPower, and then alternates between the two moves.

When not splitting, approximately a 40-40-20 probability split between #wCorrosive #wSpit, #wTackle, and #wLick. #wLick cannot be used twice in a row, and the other moves cannot be used three times in a row.
15% chance to #wSingle #wAttack except the #wMulti-Attack cannot be used 3 times in a row, and the #wSingle #wAttack cannot be used twice in a row
Always uses #wPuncture.
Always starts with #wLick, and then alternates between the two moves.
In a 3-Sentry encounter, the Sentries start with #wBolt / #wBeam / #wBolt. In the Sentry + Spheric Guardian encounter, the Sentry starts with #wBolt. Always alternates between the two moves.

Always starts with #wBurn #wStrike. Every 3 turns starting with turn 2, uses #wSkewer. Otherwise, has an equal chance to either use #wBurn #wStrike followed by #wPiercer or #wPiercer followed by #wBurn #wStrike.
65% chance of #wChomp and 35% chance of #wEnfeebling #wSpores, until #wEnfeebling #wSpores is used. Then, cycles in the order of #wChomp -> #wChomp -> #wEnfeebling #wSpores.
Has a 75% chance of using #wStasis until it has been used. Otherwise, has a 70% chance of using #wSupport #wBeam and a 30% chance of using #wBeam, but cannot use the same move three times in a row.
Starts with #wBeam, and then alternates between the two moves.
Always starts with #wIncantation. Then repeats #wDark #wStrike.
Starts with #wPerplexing #wGlare. Then, 40% chance of #wTail #wWhip and 60% chance of #wBite, but cannot #wBite three times in a row.
After waking up, cycles in the order: #wAttack -> #wAttack -> #wSiphon #wSoul.

On turn 1, 50% chance of either #wNip or #wHarden. Afterwards, has a 30-40-30 split between #wNip, #wChomp, and #wHarden, but #wHarden and #wChomp both cannot be used twice in a row, and #wNip cannot be used three times in a row. The middle Darkling cannot #wChomp and has a 50-50 split instead. When half-dead, uses #w???, followed by #wReincarnate.
Starts with #wBear #wHug, and then alternates between #wLunge and #wMaul

If there is 21 HP to heal, uses #wHeal (up to twice in a row). Otherwise, has a 60% chance of #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff and a 40% chance of #wBuff. #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff cannot be used twice in a row, and #wBuff cannot be used three times in a row.
#wAttacks twice, and then #wExplodes, doing 30 damage in the explosion if not killed.
Starts with #wMock. Afterwards, cycles in the order of #wAgonizing #wSlash -> #wCross #wSlash -> #wCross #wSlash.
50% chance of each action, but cannot #wAttack twice in a row. Cannot use #wBuff once it has been used 6 times.

For the first move, has an approximately equal chance of using the #wMulti-Attack, #wSingle-Attack, and #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff. Then, has about a 10-30-20-30-10 split between #wParasite, #wAttack #w/ #wDefend, #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff, #wMulti-Attack, and #wSingle-Attack, but can only (successfully) use #wParasite once each combat. The same move cannot be used (or rerolled) twice in a row.

effects.name: Permanently add a Parasite to deck (future combats)

ai.desc: Always uses #wHaste once, immediately after reaching below 50% HP. Otherwise, approximately a 20-45-35 probability split between #wRipple, #wReverberate, and #wHead #wSlam, except #wRipple and #wHead #wSlam cannot be used twice in a row, and #wReverberate cannot be used three times in a row.
Always uses #wTackle.

Phase 1: Always begins with #wSlash. Then, has 25% chance of using #wSoul #wStrike and a 75% chance of using #wSlash, except #wSoul #wStrike cannot be used twice in a row and #wSlash cannot be used three times in a row. Becomes half-dead and uses #wRebirth upon hitting 0 hp. NL NL Phase 2: Always begins with #wDark #wEcho. Then, 50-50 chance of using #wSludge or #wTackle, except neither can be used three times in a row.
Uses #wStab and then #wExplode.

Always starts with #wRoar. Afterwards and after using #wDrool, has a 50-50 split between #wSlam and #wNom. If used #wSlam, then has a 50-50 split between #wNom and #wDrool. Always uses #wDrool after #wNom.

Always uses #wConstrict unless it was used last turn or if the player is already #dConstricted. Otherwise, has a 50-50 chance to use #wQuick #wTackle or #wSmash, but cannot use either three times in a row.
Always uses #wScratch.
While the Mystic is alive, 65% chance to #wDefend, 35% chance to #wSlash. Once the Mystic dies, #wDefend is replaced by #wFury.

Starts with #wDebilitate. Every 3 turns (starting turn 4), uses #wBuff. Otherwise, has an equal chance of either using #wBlood #wShots followed by #wEcho or #wEcho followed by #wBlood #wShots. NL NL Additional Buffs go in order as follows: #uArtifact #u2, #uBeat #uOf #uDeath #u1, #uPainful #uStabs, #uStr #u10, and then repeats of #uStr #u50.
40% chance to use #wRake, but cannot #wStab 3 times in a row or #wRake twice in a row
Has a 60-40 split between #wLaser and #wClaw, but neither move can be used three times in a row.
Always starts with #wHex. Then alternates between either #wDebilitate or #wDrain (50% each) and then between #wZap or #wPoke (40% #wZap : 60% #wPoke).
75% chance of #wBite, and 25% chance of #wGrow, but cannot #wGrow twice in a row or #wBite 3 times in a row.
Starts with #wActivate, followed by #wAttack #wDebuff. Then, alternates between #wSlam and #wHarden.
#wMugs twice, then a 50% chance to #wLunge. After (or in place of) the #wLunge, uses #wSmoke #wBomb, and then #wEscape.
Always #wAttacks.

Always starts with #wFell. Has a 40-40-20 split between #wDouble #wStrike, #wSuck, and #wFell, but #wDouble #wStrike and #wSuck cannot be used three times in a row and #wFell cannot be used twice in a row.
Always starts with #wBellow. Then cycles in the order: #wSkull #wBash -> #wRush -> #wRush.
#wCharge for 2 turns, and then repeats #wUltimate #wBlast.
Always uses #wAttack.

Always begins with #wSpawn. On turn 4, always uses the #wMega-Debuff. Otherwise, if a Torch Head is dead, has approximately a 25-45-30 probability split between #wRevive - #wFireball - #wBuff. If all Torch Heads are alive, the split becomes 70 - 30 between #wFireball - #wBuff. Cannot use #wRevive or #wBuff twice in a row, or #wFireball three times in a row.

effects.name: Spawn Torch Heads in Empty Slots (max 2)

ai.desc: With 0 allies alive, has a 75-25 split between #wRally and #wStab. With 1 ally, has a 50-50 split between #wRally and #wStab if the last move was #wEncourage, and a 62.5-37.5 split between #wRally and #wEncourage if the last move was #wStab. With more than 1 ally, has a 66-34 split between #wEncourage and #wStab. Cannot use any move twice in a row.

On turn 1, has a 50% chance of #wBurn or #wMulti-Attack. Afterwards, has a 35-35-30 split between #wBurn, #wMulti-Attack, and #wScythe, except #wScythe and #wBurn cannot be used twice in a row, and #wMulti-Attack cannot be used three times in a row.
75% chance of #wBite, and 25% chance of #wSpit #wWeb, but cannot #wSpit #wWeb twice in a row or #wBite 3 times in a row.
60% chance of #wBite, but cannot #wBite three times in a row, or #wGrow twice in a row.
For the first 3 turns, has a 50-50 split between #wCount and #wGlare, but cannot use either move three times in a row. Afterwards, repeats #wIt #wIs #wTime.

Has 30-70 probability between #wFlame #wTackle and #wLick, though #wLick cannot be used twice in a row and #wFlame #wTackle cannot be used three times in a row. Will #wSplit once it reaches half its max HP, producing 2 slimes of its current HP.
Starts with #wActivate, then  #wDivider. Afterwards, cycles in the order #wSear -> #wTackle -> #wSear -> #wInflame -> #wTackle -> #wSear -> #wInferno.
Has 30-70 probability between #wFlame #wTackle and #wLick, though #wLick cannot be used twice in a row and #wFlame #wTackle cannot be used three times in a row.
Starts with #wSpawn #wOrbs. Then, cycles deterministically through #wFlail -> #wBoost -> #wFlail -> #wBoost -> #wHYPERBEAM -> #wBoost.
Always uses #wTackle.
#wMugs twice, then a 50% chance to #wLunge. After (or in place of) the #wLunge, uses #wSmoke #wBomb, and then #wEscape.

Cannot use #wSwoop on turn 1. When flying, has a 50-20-30 split between #wPeck, #wSwoop, and #wCaw. #wPeck cannot be used three times in a row, and #wSwoop and #wCaw cannot be used twice in a row. When knocked down, is #w(Stunned), then uses #wHeadbutt, and then #w(Start #wFlying).
Always uses #wScouring #wWhip.
Cycles in the order #wGoop #wSpray -> #wPreparing -> #wSlam. Will #wSplit into two slimes when the current HP is 50% or below, using the current HP as the new maximum HP values.

effects.name: Split into Spike Slime (L) and Acid Slime (L)

ai.desc: Always starts with #wChomp. Afterwards, has a 45-30-25 split between #wBellow, #wThrash, and #wChomp, but cannot use #wThrash three times in a row or #wChomp or #wBellow twice in a row.
20% chance of #wAttack and 80% chance of #wDebuff. Cannot #wAttack twice in a row.

Always starts with #wSummon. Otherwise, has an equal chance of all 3 moves, except cannot use #wSnake #wStrike twice in a row, #wSummon 3 times in a row, or #wBig #wBite twice in a row. Cannot #wSummon with 4 daggers alive (66-34 split between #wSnake #wStrike and #wBig #wBite in that case).

Always starts with #wStab. Then, has a 25% chance of using #wEntangle until it is used. If #wEntangle has not been used yet, cycles in the order of #wScrape -> #wStab. Otherwise, has a 45% chance of #wStab and 55% chance of #wScrape, except #wStab cannot be used three times in a row and #wScrape cannot be used twice in a row.

Every 4 turns, uses #wTaunt. Otherwise, approximately 30-0-25-45 probability split between #wDefensive #wStance - #wGloat - #wFace #wSlap - #wHeavy #wSlash. No move can be used twice in a row, and #wDefensive #wStance cannot be used more than 2 times total. When attempting to use an invalid move, will use the next move in the order of #wDefensive #wStance -> #wGloat -> #wFace #wSlap -> #wHeavy #wSlash -> #wFace #wSlap. NL NL After dropping below 50% HP, the Champ will use #wAnger (not shown), which will cleanse all debuffs and add #uStrength #u12. Then, next turn and every three turns thereafter, uses #wExecute.
